verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came יוֹסֵף֮ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef Then Joseph וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Ged and told לְפַרְעֹה֒ <S%H6547><s%> le-far-'Oh Pharaoh וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and said אָבִ֨י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi My father וְאַחַ֜י <S%H251><s%> ve-'a-Chai and my brethren וְצֹאנָ֤ם <S%H6629><s%> ve-tzo-Nam and their flocks וּבְקָרָם֙ <S%H1241><s%> u-ve-ka-Ram and their herds וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u and all that they have are come out מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz of the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan וְהִנָּ֖ם <S%H2005><s%> ve-hin-Nam are in בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz and behold they [are] in the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H1657><s%> Go-shen. of Goshen

וּמִקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> u-mik-Tzeh some אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav, of his brethren לָקַ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> la-Kach And he took חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah [even] five אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim; men וַיַּצִּגֵ֖ם <S%H3322><s%> vai-yatz-tzi-Gem and presented לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei them unto פַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh. Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said פַּרְעֹ֛ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh And Pharaoh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav unto his brethren מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What מַּעֲשֵׂיכֶ֑ם <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-sei-Chem; act וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, unto Pharaoh רֹעֵ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Eh are shepherds צֹאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> tzoN cattle עֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha, Thy servants גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- both אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- both אֲבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tei-nu. both we [and] also our fathers

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru They said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, moreover unto Pharaoh לָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> la-Gur For to sojourn בָּאָרֶץ֮ <S%H776><s%> ba-'a-Retz in the land בָּאנוּ֒ <S%H935><s%> ba-Nu are we come כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there מִרְעֶ֗ה <S%H4829><s%> mir-'Eh, have no pasture לַצֹּאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> latz-tzoN for their flocks אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher your לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> la-'a-va-Dei-cha, for thy servants כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for כָבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> cha-Ved [is] sore הָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> ha-ra-'Av for the famine בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan וְעַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now יֵֽשְׁבוּ־ <S%H3427><s%> ye-she-vu- dwell נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na please עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha now therefore we pray thee let thy servants בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <S%H1657><s%> Go-shen. of Goshen

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, And Pharaoh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef unto Joseph לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying אָבִ֥יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha Thy father וְאַחֶ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> ve-'a-Chei-cha and thy brethren בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u are come אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha. about

אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz The land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha [is] before thee הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he בְּמֵיטַ֣ב <S%H4315><s%> be-mei-Tav in the best הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the land הוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> ho-Shev to dwell אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha thy father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אַחֶ֑יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-cha; and brethren יֵשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> ye-she-Vu let them dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land גֹּ֔שֶׁן <S%H1657><s%> Go-shen, of Goshen וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- and if יָדַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta, know וְיֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> ve-yesh- any בָּם֙ bam אַנְשֵׁי־ <S%H376><s%> 'an-shei- men חַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil, of activity וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ם <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Tam among them then make them שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei rulers מִקְנֶ֖ה <S%H4735><s%> mik-Neh over my cattle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after לִֽי׃ Li.

וַיָּבֵ֤א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve brought in יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַֽעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv, his father וַיַּֽעֲמִדֵ֖הוּ <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-mi-De-hu and set him לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before פַרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh; Pharaoh וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech blessed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko and Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh. Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh And Pharaoh אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko; unto Jacob כַּמָּ֕ה <S%H4100><s%> kam-Mah How יְמֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei age שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8141><s%> she-Nei years חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yei-cha. age

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, unto Pharaoh יְמֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei The days שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8141><s%> she-Nei of the years מְגוּרַ֔י <S%H4033><s%> me-gu-Rai, of my pilgrimage שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim and thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <S%H3967><s%> u-me-'At [are] an hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years מְעַ֣ט <S%H4592><s%> me-'At few וְרָעִ֗ים <S%H7451><s%> ve-ra-'Im, and evil הָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu have been יְמֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei have the days שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8141><s%> she-Nei of the years חַיַּ֔י <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yai, of my life וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor הִשִּׂ֗יגוּ <S%H5381><s%> his-Si-gu, been and have not attained אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְמֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei unto the days שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8141><s%> she-Nei of the years חַיֵּ֣י <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yei of the life אֲבֹתַ֔י <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tai, of my fathers בִּימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei in the days מְגוּרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4033><s%> me-gu-rei-Hem. of their pilgrimage

וַיְבָ֥רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> vay-Va-rech blessed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh; Pharaoh וַיֵּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze and went out מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei from before פַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh. Pharaoh

וַיְכַלְכֵּ֤ל <S%H3557><s%> vay-chal-Kel nourished יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv his father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav, and his brethren וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit household אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; and all his father's לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem with bread לְפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> le-Fi according הַטָּֽף׃ <S%H2945><s%> hat-Taf. to [their] families

וַיִּתֹּ֣ם <S%H8552><s%> vai-yit-Tom failed הַכֶּ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef, And when money מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַיִם֮ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-ra-Yim of Egypt וּמֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> u-me-'E-retz and in the land כְּנַעַן֒ <S%H3667><s%> ke-na-'An of Canaan וַיָּבֹאוּ֩ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-vo-'U came כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all מִצְרַ֨יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef unto Joseph לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor and said הָֽבָה־ <S%H3051><s%> ha-vah- Give לָּ֣נוּ La-nu לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem, us bread וְלָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> ve-Lam-mah why נָמ֖וּת <S%H4191><s%> na-Mut for why should we die נֶגְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5048><s%> neg-De-cha; about כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָפֵ֖ס <S%H656><s%> 'a-Fes faileth כָּֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef. in thy presence;for the money
